class.name: SortGroup
class.brief_description: [SortGroup] allows grouping [Sprite3D] and [Label3D] nodes, to control the order in which they are rendered.

method.name: get_sort_group
method.description: Returns sort group id, which can be used to add any material to the group, using [member Material.sort_group] property.

members.member: Sets the render priority for the group. Higher priority objects will be sorted in front of lower priority objects.
